Package Finding_Kuro

Class Story

java.lang.Object
Finding_Kuro.Story
All Implemented Interfaces:
Events
public class Story extends Object implements Events
This class stores the dialogues and the possible choices in the game
Author:
Icyl Kate Lucero

  • Constructor Details

    • Story

      public Story(Game g, GUI userinterface, Transition transition)
      Parameters:
      g - moves the player from current position to the selected position
      userinterface - shows the GUI
      transition - helps transition from title screen to game screen

  • Method Details

    • defaultSetup

      public void defaultSetup()
      This is the default status of the player at the start of the game
      Parameters:
      player - .hp is the default hit points of the player
      player - .currentWeapon is the default weapon of the player

    • selectPosition

      public void selectPosition(String nextPosition)
      Parameters:
      nextPosition - helps switch to the location the player chooses Note that there is a break after each case so that it does not loop in the current position
